com.salesforce.androidsdk.app
Class ForceApp

java.lang.Object
  Application
      com.salesforce.androidsdk.app.ForceApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountWatcher.AccountRemoved
public abstract class ForceApp
extends Application
implements AccountWatcher.AccountRemoved

Super class for all force applications. You should extend this class or make sure to initialize HttpAccess in your application's onCreate method.

public static void changePasscode(java.lang.String oldPass,
                                  java.lang.String newPass)
Changes the passcode to a new value and re-encrypts the smartstore with the new passcode.

Parameters:
oldPass - Old passcode.
newPass - New passcode.

                   boolean showLoginPage)

getUserAgent

public final java.lang.String getUserAgent()
Set a user agent string based on the mobile SDK version. We are building a user agent of the form: SalesforceMobileSDK/ android/ appName/appVersion

Returns:
The user agent string to use for all requests.

getAccountType

public java.lang.String getAccountType()
Returns:
The authentication account type (should match authenticator.xml).

Helper function

Returns:
true if application is running on a tablet
